issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Add isDebugEnabled check for debug logs in nodemanager

comments.body:
[~bibinchundatt], as this is a straightforward change, how about guarding up all LOG.debug statements across nodemanager instead of only this specific class ? We have a few more of them.
Only the ones called repeatedly would need change.
{noformat}
#root:~/Projects/hadoop/hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-server/hadoop-yarn-server-nodemanager$ grep -R "LOG.debug" * | awk -F":" '{print $1}' | sort | uniq -c
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/amrmproxy/AMRMProxyService.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/amrmproxy/AMRMProxyTokenSecretManager.java
      2 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/amrmproxy/DefaultRequestInterceptor.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/application/ApplicationImpl.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/container/ContainerImpl.java
      2 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/ContainerManagerImpl.java
      9 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/launcher/ContainerLaunch.java
      5 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/linux/privileged/PrivilegedOperationExecutor.java
      4 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/linux/resources/CGroupsHandlerImpl.java
      3 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/linux/resources/ResourceHandlerModule.java
      2 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/linux/resources/TrafficControlBandwidthHandlerImpl.java
      5 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/linux/resources/TrafficController.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/linux/runtime/DelegatingLinuxContainerRuntime.java
      5 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/linux/runtime/DockerLinuxContainerRuntime.java
      2 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/localizer/LocalizedResource.java
      6 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/localizer/ResourceLocalizationService.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/localizer/security/LocalizerSecurityInfo.java
      3 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/localizer/security/LocalizerTokenSelector.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/logaggregation/AppLogAggregatorImpl.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/loghandler/NonAggregatingLogHandler.java
      5 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/containermanager/monitor/ContainersMonitorImpl.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/DefaultContainerExecutor.java
      4 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/DeletionService.java
      2 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/LinuxContainerExecutor.java
      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/NodeManager.java
     11 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/NodeStatusUpdaterImpl.java
     15 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/recovery/NMLeveldbStateStoreService.java
      2 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/scheduler/DistributedScheduler.java
      4 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/security/NMTokenSecretManagerInNM.java
      4 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/timelineservice/NMTimelinePublisher.java

     12 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/WindowsSecureContainerExecutor.java
#root:~/Projects/hadoop/hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-server/hadoop-yarn-server-nodemanager$ grep -R "LOG.isDebug" * | awk -F":" '{print $1}' | sort | uniq -c

      2 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/amrmproxy/DefaultRequestInterceptor.java

      1 src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/nodemanager/NodeManager.java
